pr_title: Hardcode bucket names to network enum

timeline.message:
Hardcode bucket names to network enum

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Hardcode bucket names to network enum

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: I assume you moved it here just because network was here and it made it a little easier to have it consolidated. But as mentioned previously we should keep it where it makes better sense and to not break clients. Recommend keeping network here and moving bucketName back to CommonDownloaderProperties. Then you can inject MirrorProperties into CommonDownloaderProperties to consolidate logic.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText:
Yep that was my reasoning. Also figured since it was tied to the bucket it should exist on the same level.
Does make sense to leave as is and not cause a visible change
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.message:
Revert moving bucketName porperty out

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Pull commonDownloaderProperties and mirrorProperties from injected downloaderProperties

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Increaseoffset between historic and incoming messages

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think the bucket name should act as an override for all environments, not just for OTHER. When testnet gets reset again and gets a new bucket we don't want to be blocked on a new build to correct the enum. Update docs in other areas as appropriate.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: please update docs as well as mentioned.
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.message:
Updated getBucketName to default to hedera.mirror.importer.downloader.bucketName if not null

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Updated docs and empty bucketname check

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Updated schema documentaiton for bucket names
